items.sentence: I\'m sure Tom understands what we want him to do.
I\'m sure Tom will tell us if he needs something.
I\'m sure Tom would never do something like that.
Tom didn\'t become famous until late in his life.
Tom didn\'t even step out of the house yesterday.
Tom didn\'t find anyone who met the requirements.
We haven\'t yet discussed which method is better.
Tom was dead by the time the ambulance got there.
Tom, Mary and their friends sat around the table.
Tom and Mary have been in Boston for three years.
